existing_features.title: Fix the registration flow so that newly registered users are immediately granted access to the main app without any approval gate or waiting screen. After completing profile setup, users must be routed directly to the main application.

Fix the admin member removal feature so that admins can successfully remove members from the Members tab in the Admin panel. The remove action must call the correct backend function, handle errors gracefully, and reflect the updated member list immediately after removal.

projectName: Fix registration flow and admin member removal
